welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Harborne, a charming city known for its vibrant community, rich history, and picturesque streets. Get ready to experience its unique charm and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of West Midlands International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
